author: Jon Moody
title: "You are going to hospital!" 10 pre-fight David Haye quotes about Tony Bellew he may now regret
text:
Many doubted that it could, but David Haye's heavyweight showdown with Tony Bellew last night most certainly delivered. 
The cagey affair turned on its head in the sixth round when Haye SNAPPED his Achilles, leaving him barely able to walk - let alone fight. 
But the Bermondsey battler bravely fought on for five more rounds, eventually succumbing to Bellew in the 11th when his team threw in the towel. 
The epic bout was the culmination of months of trash talk when things got VERY heated between the pair.   
As you can see in the video at the top of the page, a lot of the big threats in the build-up came from Haye - and it's this lot he may now regret saying. 
On top of this, the Londoner also threatened to send Bellew "to hospital" during the recording of The Gloves Are Off. Ironically, it was Haye himself who ended up needing hospital treatment as surgery is required on his injured Achilles. (Photo: REUTERS) 
For all the pre-fight talk - some of which could still land Haye in hot water - the pair did put their differences aside at its conclusion, embracing in the ring and praising each other in their joint interviews. (Photo: REUTERS)
